clue: Luxury brand takes on new distributor
explanation: Luxury brand (CHANEL) takes on new (N), to give CHANNEL, meaning "distributor" (means of distribution).
hints: "Takes on" is telling us to allow one part of the wordplay to contain another.
In cryptics, "new" can simply be represented by the letter N.
We need to subtitute "luxury brand" for, well, a luxury brand!
